trans-unit.source: Displays a single-month calendar that enables the user to select dates and move to the next or previous month.
trans-unit.target: 顯示單一月份的行事曆，讓使用者可以選取日期並移至下個月或上個月。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#Introduction)
trans-unit.target: [簡介](#Introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Accessibility](#Accessibility)
trans-unit.target: [協助工具選項](#Accessibility)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax)
trans-unit.target: [宣告式語法](#DeclarativeSyntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 簡介

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control to display a single month of a calendar on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>在網頁上顯示單一月份的行事曆控制項。

trans-unit.source: The control allows you to select dates and move to the next or previous month.
trans-unit.target: 控制項可讓您選取日期並移至下一個或上一個月份。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control supports all the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar?displayProperty=nameWithType> types in the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項支援所有<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar?displayProperty=nameWithType>中的型別<xref:System.Globalization>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Apart from the Gregorian calendar, this also includes calendars that use different year and month systems, such as the Hjiri calendar.
trans-unit.target: 除了西曆，這也包括使用不同的年份和月份系統，例如回曆的行事曆。

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control allows you to select a single day, week, or entire month by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項可讓您藉由設定選取一天、 週或整個月<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, the control displays the days of the month, day headings for the days of the week, a title with the month name and year, links for selecting individual days of the month, and links for moving to the next and previous month.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，控制項會顯示每月天數，day 標題天數的每週的月份和年份、 選取個別日期的月份，連結和連結移至下一步] 和 [上一個月份的標題。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control by setting the properties that control the style for different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以自訂的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>藉由設定控制控制項的不同部分的樣式屬性的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties that specify the style for the different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的屬性，指定控制項的不同部分的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the section that displays the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 指定之區段會顯示一周天數的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the dates in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 指定在顯示的月份日期的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the navigation controls in the title section.
trans-unit.target: 指定標題區段中的導覽控制項的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the dates that are not in the currently displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 指定不在目前顯示的月份日期的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the selected dates on the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 指定在行事曆上的選取日期的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the week and month date-selection column.
trans-unit.target: 指定的週和月份選取日期資料行的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the title section.
trans-unit.target: 指定的樣式標題區段。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for today's date.
trans-unit.target: 指定今天日期的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the weekend dates.
trans-unit.target: 指定週末日期的樣式。

trans-unit.source: You can also show or hide different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以顯示或隱藏的控制項的不同部分。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可控制哪些部分要顯示或隱藏的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Shows or hides the section that displays the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 顯示或隱藏顯示一周天數的區段。

trans-unit.source: Shows or hides the gridlines between the days of the month.
trans-unit.target: 顯示或隱藏每月天數間的格線。

trans-unit.source: Shows or hides the navigation controls to the next or previous month.
trans-unit.target: 顯示或隱藏的一個或下一個月份的導覽控制項。

trans-unit.source: Shows or hides the title section.
trans-unit.target: 顯示或隱藏標題區段。

trans-unit.source: Although binding to a data source is not supported for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, you can modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells.
trans-unit.target: 雖然不支援繫結至資料來源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項，您可以修改內容和個別的日期資料格的格式。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>在網頁上顯示控制項時，它會建立組合構成控制項的元件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event is raised when each date cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>就會引發事件時每個日期儲存格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>建立控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell as it is created by providing code in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以控制內容和格式的日期 儲存格，因為它提供的事件處理常式的程式碼會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關自訂的日期 儲存格內容的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control renders ECMAScript (JScript, JavaScript) to the client browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項呈現的 ECMAScript （JScript、 JavaScript） 用戶端瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: The client browser must have ECMAScript enabled for this control to function properly.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端瀏覽器必須要有 ECMAScript 啟用此控制項的正常運作。

trans-unit.source: For more information on client script, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關用戶端指令碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[用戶端指令碼中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa)。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 協助工具選項

trans-unit.source: The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards.
trans-unit.target: 協助工具標準，可能不符合呈現，根據預設，此控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需對這個控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 宣告式語法

trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>編輯其中一個所顯示的資料行時所使用的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is bound to the data source with the `Bind` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項所繫結至資料來源與`Bind`方法。

trans-unit.source: The `Eval` method is used to bind the date value that is displayed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: `Eval`方法用來繫結所顯示的日期值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>類別。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a text value that is rendered as a caption for the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定呈現為月曆標題的文字值。

trans-unit.source: The table caption.
trans-unit.target: 資料表標題。

trans-unit.source: A table caption is used to describe the nature of the table in one to three sentences.
trans-unit.target: 資料表標題用來描述本質的一到三個句子中的資料表。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CaptionAlign%2A> property to align the caption with the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CaptionAlign%2A>具有行事曆的標題的對齊屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.Caption%2A> property to display a caption for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.Caption%2A>屬性顯示的標題<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the text that is rendered as a caption for the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定呈現為月曆標題之文字的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> value that indicates the alignment of the caption.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> 值，表示標題的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: This property determines where the caption appears in relation to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會決定出現在標題<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign.NotSet>, which lets the browser determine where to align the caption.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign.NotSet>，可讓瀏覽器判斷標題的對齊的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following table explains the relationship between the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign> value and the appearance of the caption.
trans-unit.target: 下表說明之間的關聯性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>值和標題的外觀。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign> value
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign> 值

trans-unit.source: Appearance
trans-unit.target: 外觀

trans-unit.source: The caption appears at the bottom of the calendar, with the text centered.
trans-unit.target: 底部的行事曆 的標題是以文字置中顯示。

trans-unit.source: The caption appears at the top of the calendar, with the text left-aligned.
trans-unit.target: 標題會出現在頂端的 行事曆，靠左對齊的文字。

trans-unit.source: The caption alignment is not set and is determined by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 標題對齊方式未設定，取決於瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: The caption appears at the top of the calendar, with the text right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: 標題會出現在頂端的 行事曆，靠右對齊的文字。

trans-unit.source: The caption appears at the top of the calendar with the text centered.
trans-unit.target: 頂端的行事曆的標題是以文字置中顯示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CaptionAlign%2A> property to align a caption for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CaptionAlign%2A>對齊的標題屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距數 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="2" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="2" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來控制的儲存格的內容與儲存格的框線之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 指定的填補量會加入至儲存格的四個邊。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 個別儲存格大小不能指定。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `-1` indicates that this property is not set in the rendered table.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定為`-1`表示呈現的資料表中沒有設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CellPadding%2A> property to pad each cell with 5 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CellPadding%2A>填補 5 像素的每個資料格屬性。

trans-unit.source: The specified cell padding is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的儲存格填補小於 -1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between cells.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格之間的間距數 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="0" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="0" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to control the spacing between individual cells in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來控制在行事曆中的個別儲存格之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 垂直和水平，則會套用這個間距。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `-1` indicates that this property is not set in the rendered table.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定為`-1`表示呈現的資料表中沒有設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CellSpacing%2A> property to space the cells 5 pixels apart.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CellSpacing%2A>屬性，以空格分開的儲存格 5 像素。

trans-unit.source: The specified cell spacing is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的儲存格間距小於 -1。

trans-unit.source: Creates a collection to store child controls.
trans-unit.target: 建立儲存子控制項的集合。

trans-unit.source: Always returns an <see langword="InternalControlCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 永遠傳回 <see langword="InternalControlCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CreateControlCollection%2A> method is primarily of interest to control developers who extend the functionality of the Calendar control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CreateControlCollection%2A>是主要由控制項開發人員擴充月曆控制項的功能感興趣的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CreateControlCollection%2A> method in a custom server control so that it always returns a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection> class for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CreateControlCollection%2A>方法中自訂的伺服器控制項，以便一律會傳回的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection>類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the section that displays the day of the week.
trans-unit.target: 取得顯示星期區段的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that contains the style properties for the section that displays the day of the week.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />，包含顯示星期之區段的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the section that displays the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性指定之區段會顯示一周天數的樣式。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關可以控制不同的樣式屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>。

trans-unit.source: The name format for the days of the week is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 一周天數的名稱格式由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 只在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A> 屬性設為 `true` 時，這個屬性才適用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayHeaderStyle%2A> property to specify a bold font for the section that displays the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayHeaderStyle%2A>屬性來指定以粗體字顯示一周天數的區段。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name format for days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定星期的名稱格式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="Short" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="Short" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A> property to specify the name format for the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A>屬性，以指定的名稱格式為每週天數。

trans-unit.source: This property is set with one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設為其中一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the days of the week are displayed as the full name, short (abbreviated) name, first letter of the day, or first two letters of the day.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定是否顯示一周天數的完整名稱，簡短 （縮寫） 的名稱、 為一天的第一個字母或每日的前兩個字母。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性僅適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The day names are based on the server's local settings.
trans-unit.target: 星期幾名稱會根據伺服器的本機設定。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A> property to specify that days of the week are displayed in full.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A>屬性來指定完整顯示的每週天數。

trans-unit.source: The specified day name format is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的日期名稱格式不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when each day is created in the control hierarchy for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於各個日期在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控制項的控制項階層架構中建立時。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when each day is created in the control hierarchy for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 每一天建立的控制項階層架構中時，會引發這個事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Although data binding is not supported for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells.
trans-unit.target: 雖然不支援資料繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項，就能修改內容的個別的日期資料格的格式。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>在網頁上顯示控制項時，它會建立組合構成控制項的元件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event is raised when each date cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>就會引發事件時每個日期儲存格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>建立控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以控制內容和格式的日期 儲存格時提供的事件處理常式的程式碼會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關自訂的日期 儲存格內容的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event is raised while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is being rendered, you cannot add a control that can also raise an event, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>就會引發事件時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>呈現控制項，您無法加入的控制項，可能也會引發事件，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>。

trans-unit.source: You can only add static controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>.
trans-unit.target: 您只能新增靜態控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event to make the background color yellow for the days in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>事件，讓背景的黃色中顯示的月份日期。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to customize the contents of a cell by adding a <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=nameWithType> control to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範如何加入自訂資料格內容<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項加入儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the days in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 取得所顯示月份中日期的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that contains the style properties for the days in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />，包含顯示月份中日期的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the days in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性指定的樣式中顯示的月份日期。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a different style for the selected date, weekend dates, dates not in the currently displayed month, or today's date, these dates will also be displayed using the style specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未選取的日期、 週末日期、 不在目前顯示的月份、 日期或今天的日期指定不同的樣式，這些日期將也會顯示使用指定的樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A> properties to specify alternative styles for these dates.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A>屬性，以指定替代的樣式，這些日期。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關可以控制不同的樣式屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>。

trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek" /> 值。

trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="Default" />，指出使用系統設定值所指定的日期。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A> property to specify the day of the week to display in the first day column of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>屬性來指定要顯示的第一個日期資料行中一週天數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is set with one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設為其中一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify any day of the week or `FirstDayOfWeek.Default`, which indicates that the date is determined by the system settings.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定一週的任何一天或`FirstDayOfWeek.Default`，表示日期由系統設定。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>屬性設為 星期一的第一個日期資料行。

trans-unit.source: The date specified is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的日期不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode" /> 物件是否包含週選取器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode" /> contains week selectors; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved condition of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 的已儲存條件。

trans-unit.target: 載入 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控制項的已儲存狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed for the next month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示於移往下個月份巡覽控制項的文字。

trans-unit.source: The caption text for the next month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 移往下個月份的巡覽控制項的標題文字。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword=""&gt;"" />, which is rendered as the greater than sign (>).
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<see langword=""&gt;"" />，這會轉譯為大於符號 (>)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A> property to provide custom text for the next month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A>屬性以提供自訂文字的下一個月份導覽控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used along with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A> property to provide a custom set of navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於連同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A>屬性提供一組自訂的導覽控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property does not automatically encode to HTML.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會自動編碼為 HTML。

trans-unit.source: You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value, unless you want the characters to be treated as HTML.
trans-unit.target: 您需要特殊字元轉換成適當的 HTML 值，除非您想要視為 HTML 中的字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, to explicitly display the greater than symbol (>), you must use the value `>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要明確顯示大於符號 (>)，您必須使用值`>`。

trans-unit.source: Because this property does not automatically encode to HTML, it is possible to specify an HTML tag for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會自動編碼為 HTML，因為它是指定之 HTML 標記<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to display an image for the next month navigation control, you can set this property to an expression that contains an `` element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要顯示的下一個月份巡覽控制項之影像中，您可以設定此屬性包含的運算式``項目。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性僅適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="CustomText" />。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> property is set to `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event is raised when each date cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>就會引發事件時每個日期儲存格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>建立控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以控制內容和格式的日期 儲存格時提供的事件處理常式的程式碼會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式會接收<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs>物件，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs> object contains two properties that you can use to programmatically control the format of the date cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs>物件包含兩個屬性可讓您以程式設計方式控制 [日期] 儲存格的格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A> property represents the cell being rendered, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Day%2A> property represents the date to render in the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A>屬性表示儲存格呈現，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Day%2A>屬性表示的日期資料格中轉譯。

trans-unit.source: You can also customize the contents of a cell by dynamically adding controls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以由以動態方式將控制項加入自訂資料格內容<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event is raised while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is being rendered, you cannot add a control that can also raise an event, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>就會引發事件時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>呈現控制項，您無法加入的控制項，可能也會引發事件，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>。

trans-unit.source: You can only add static controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>.
trans-unit.target: 您只能新增靜態控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event to make the background color yellow for the days in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>事件，讓背景的黃色中顯示的月份日期。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to customize the contents of a cell by adding a <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=nameWithType> control to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範如何加入自訂資料格內容<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項加入儲存格。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell,System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell,System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell,System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell,System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnPreRender%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnPreRender%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnPreRender%2A> method so that it always displays a three-point border in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> server control.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control and allows you to provide a custom handler for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 事件，並允許您提供 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged" /> 事件的自訂處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised when the user selects a day, a week, or an entire month by clicking the date selector controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>當使用者按一下以選取一天、 週或整個月份的日期選擇器控制項時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the month currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，表示目前在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 中顯示的月份。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the previous month displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，表示由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 顯示的上個月份。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control and allows you to provide a custom handler for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 事件，並允許您提供 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged" /> 事件的自訂處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged> event is raised when the user clicks the next or previous month navigation elements on the title section.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged>使用者按一下標題區段上的一個或下一個月份巡覽項目時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnVisibleMonthChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnVisibleMonthChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged> event to display whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> has moved forward or backward one month.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged>要顯示的事件是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>已移往前或往後的一個月。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnVisibleMonthChanged(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnVisibleMonthChanged(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnVisibleMonthChanged(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnVisibleMonthChanged(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the days on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control that are not in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控制項上，不在顯示月份中日期的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that contains the style properties for the days on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control that are not in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控制項上不在顯示月份中日期的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the days on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control that are not in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性上指定天數的樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項不在顯示的月份。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A> property is not set, the style specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A>中未設定屬性，指定樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>屬性使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關可以控制不同的樣式屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A> property to specify a light gray foreground color for the days on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control that are not in the currently displayed month.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A>屬性上指定天數的淺灰色的前景色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項不在目前顯示的月份。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed for the previous month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示於移往上個月份巡覽控制項的文字。

trans-unit.source: The caption text for the previous month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 移往上個月份的巡覽控制項的標題文字。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword=""&lt;"" />, which is rendered as the less than sign (<).
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<see langword=""&lt;"" />，這會轉譯為小於符號 (<)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A> property to provide custom text for the previous month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A>屬性以提供自訂文字的上一個月份導覽控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used along with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A> property to provide a custom set of navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於連同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A>屬性提供一組自訂的導覽控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property does not automatically encode to HTML.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會自動編碼為 HTML。

trans-unit.source: You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value, unless you want the characters to be treated as HTML.
trans-unit.target: 您需要特殊字元轉換成適當的 HTML 值，除非您想要視為 HTML 中的字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, to explicitly display the greater than symbol (>), you must use the value `>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要明確顯示大於符號 (>)，您必須使用值`>`。

trans-unit.source: Because this property does not automatically encode to HTML, it is possible to specify an HTML tag for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會自動編碼為 HTML，因為它是指定之 HTML 標記<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to display an image for the next month navigation control, you can set this property to an expression that contains an `` element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要顯示的下一個月份巡覽控制項之影像中，您可以設定此屬性包含的運算式``項目。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性僅適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A> property to specify custom text for the previous month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A>屬性來指定上一個月份瀏覽控制項的自訂文字。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the event argument passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，代表傳遞至事件處理常式的事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Raises an event for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 回傳至伺服器時，會引發 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控制項的事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會在內部使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.Render%2A>自訂的伺服器控制項中的方法，讓<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>一律顯示影像。

trans-unit.source: Stores the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 儲存 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控制項的狀態。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the saved state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 之儲存狀態的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the selected date.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選取的日期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the selected date.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，表示選取的日期。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property to determine the selected date on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>屬性來判斷所選取的日期上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection are closely related.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合密切相關。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, a mode that allows only a single date selection, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value and `SelectedDates.Count` equals 1.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.Day`，允許只有單一日期選項的模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值和`SelectedDates.Count`等於 1。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modes that allows multiple date selections, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`，模式，可讓多個日期選擇範圍，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property is set using a <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=nameWithType> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>屬性會設定使用<xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=nameWithType>物件。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a date on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者選取日期上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property is updated to the selected date.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>會更新屬性以選取的日期。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection is also updated to contain just this date.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合也會更新以包含剛才此日期。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection are updated before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合更新之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: You can override the date selection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A> event handler to manually set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用覆寫選取日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A>事件處理常式，以手動方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event does not get raised when this property is programmatically set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>不未取得引發事件，以程式設計方式設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property to determine the selected date on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>屬性來判斷所選取的日期上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> objects that represent the selected dates on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 控制項中所選取日期的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection" /> that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> objects representing the selected dates on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection" />，包含表示 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 上所選取日期之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection to determine the currently selected dates on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合，以判斷要在目前選取的日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection are closely related.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合密切相關。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, a mode that allows only a single date selection, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value and `SelectedDates.Count` equals 1.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.Day`，允許只有單一日期選項的模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值和`SelectedDates.Count`等於 1。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modes that allows multiple date selections, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`，模式，可讓多個日期選擇範圍，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> property stores a collection of <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=nameWithType> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>屬性儲存的集合<xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=nameWithType>物件。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a week or month on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者選取一週或月在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The selected dates are added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection, replacing the previous contents.
trans-unit.target: 選取的日期會加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合，取代先前的內容。

trans-unit.source: The range of dates are sorted in ascending order by date.
trans-unit.target: 依日期的遞增順序排序的日期範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property is also updated to contain the first date in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>屬性也會更新以包含在第一個日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection to programmatically select dates on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合以程式設計方式上選取日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Clear%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.SelectRange%2A> methods to programmatically manipulate the selected dates in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Remove%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Clear%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.SelectRange%2A>方法來以程式設計方式管理中的選取的日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection are updated before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合更新之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: You can override the date selection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A> event handler to manually set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用覆寫選取日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A>事件處理常式，以手動方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is not raised when this collection is programmatically set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>以程式設計方式設定這個集合時，不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection to determine the selected dates on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>集合，以判斷要在選定的日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the selected dates.
trans-unit.target: 取得選取日期的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that contains the style properties for the selected dates.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />，包含選取日期的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the selected dates on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來指定所選取日期的樣式，在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A> property is not set, the style specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>中未設定屬性，指定樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>屬性使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關可以控制不同的樣式屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A> property to specify a blue background color for the selected dates on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>屬性來指定藍色背景色彩所選取日期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user selects a day, a week, or an entire month by clicking the date selector controls.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按一下日期選取器控制項以選取日、週或整個月份時。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the user selects a day, a week, or an entire month by clicking the date selector controls.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者選取一天、 週或整個月，依序按一下 日期選擇器控制項時，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event to display the number of items selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>事件顯示在選取的項目數量<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date selection mode on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control that specifies whether the user can select a single day, a week, or an entire month.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控制項上的日期選取模式，指定使用者是否可以選取單一日、週或整個月份。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="Day" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="Day" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property to specify the date selection mode on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>屬性來指定的日期選取範圍模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is set with one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設為其中一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the user can select a single day, a week, or an entire month, or you can disable date-selection capability entirely.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定使用者可以選取一天、 週或整個月份，或您將可以完全停用日期選取功能。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, an additional selector column that contains week and month selection controls is displayed in the first column of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`，包含週和月份選取控制項的其他選擇器資料行，都會在第一個資料行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectorStyle%2A> property to customize the appearance of this column.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectorStyle%2A>屬性來自訂這個資料行的外觀。

trans-unit.source: To disable date selection, set this property to `CalendarSelectionMode.None`.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用日期選取範圍，將此屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.None`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property to allow date selection by a single day, a week, or an entire month.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>屬性，以允許一天、 週或整個月份所選取的日期。

trans-unit.source: The specified selection mode is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的選取模式不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed for the month selection element in the selector column.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示於選取器欄位中月份選取項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text displayed for the month selection element in the selector column.
trans-unit.target: 顯示於選取器欄位中月份選取項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword=""&gt;&gt;"" />, which is rendered as two greater than signs (>>).
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<see langword=""&gt;&gt;"" />，這會轉譯為兩個大於符號 (>>)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectMonthText%2A> property to provide custom text for the month selection element in the selector column.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectMonthText%2A>屬性以提供自訂文字月份選取項目的選取器的資料行中。

trans-unit.source: This property does not automatically encode to HTML.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會自動編碼為 HTML。

trans-unit.source: You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value, unless you want the characters to be treated as HTML.
trans-unit.target: 您需要特殊字元轉換成適當的 HTML 值，除非您想要視為 HTML 中的字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, to explicitly display the greater than symbol (>), you must use the value `>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要明確顯示大於符號 (>)，您必須使用值`>`。

trans-unit.source: Because this property does not automatically encode to HTML, it is possible to specify an HTML tag for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectMonthText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會自動編碼為 HTML，因為它是指定之 HTML 標記<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectMonthText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to display an image for the next month navigation control, you can set this property to an expression that contains an `` element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要顯示的下一個月份巡覽控制項之影像中，您可以設定此屬性包含的運算式``項目。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性僅適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectMonthText%2A> property to provide custom text for the month selection element.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectMonthText%2A>以提供自訂文字月份選取項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the week and month selector column.
trans-unit.target: 取得週和月份選取器欄位的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that contains the style properties for the week and month selector column.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />，包含週和月份選取器欄位的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the week and month selector column.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性指定的週和月份選取器資料行樣式。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關可以控制不同的樣式屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectorStyle%2A> property applies only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`.

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectWeekText%2A>屬性以提供自訂文字週選取項目的選取器的資料行中。

trans-unit.source: This property does not automatically encode to HTML.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會自動編碼為 HTML。

trans-unit.source: You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value, unless you want the characters to be treated as HTML.
trans-unit.target: 您需要特殊字元轉換成適當的 HTML 值，除非您想要視為 HTML 中的字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, to explicitly display the greater than symbol (>), you must use the value `>`.

trans-unit.source: Because this property does not automatically encode to HTML, it is possible to specify an HTML tag for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectWeekText%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to display an image for the next month navigation control, you can set this property to an expression that contains an `` element.

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性僅適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>屬性設定為`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指出如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.target: 標記開始追蹤的起點，並且儲存變更至控制項做為控制項檢視狀態的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to render the table header <see langword="<th>" /> HTML element for the day headers instead of the table data <see langword="<td>" /> HTML element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否為日期標頭呈現資料表標頭 <see langword="<th>" /> HTML 項目而不是資料表資料 <see langword="<td>" /> HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see langword="<th>" /> element is used for day header cells; <see langword="false" /> if the <see langword="<td>" /> element is used for day headers.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 項目用於日期標題儲存格，則為 <see langword="<th>" />，如果 <see langword="false" /> 項目用於日期標頭，則為 <see langword="<td>" />。

trans-unit.source: The table header `<th>` HTML element is used for day header cells by default.
trans-unit.target: 資料表標頭`<th>`HTML 項目預設會使用日期標頭資料格。

trans-unit.source: You can revert to the .NET Framework version 1.0 behavior of using `<td>` elements for day header cells by setting this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以還原使用的.NET Framework 1.0 版行為`<td>`項目日期標頭資料格，此屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: Note that changing this value can affect scripts that rely on the rendering behavior of the version 1.0 edition of this control.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，變更此值可能會影響依賴 1.0 版的此控制項的呈現行為的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The use of the `<th>` element might also alter the visible rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control in browsers by making the day header cells center-aligned and bold.
trans-unit.target: 使用`<th>`項目也可能改變的可見的轉譯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>藉由置中對齊和粗體日期標頭資料格的瀏覽器中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value that specifies the month to display on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 值，指定要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控制項上顯示的月份。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the month to display on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，指定要顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 上的月份。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />, which displays the month that contains the date specified by <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodaysDate" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />，其會顯示包含 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodaysDate" /> 所指定之日期的月份。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleDate%2A> property to programmatically set the month to display on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleDate%2A>屬性以程式設計方式設定要顯示在上個月<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The specified date can be any date in the month you want to display, although it is common to use the first date in the month.
trans-unit.target: 指定的日期可以是任何您想要顯示，但通常會使用月份的第一個日期的月份日期。

trans-unit.source: This property is set using a <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=nameWithType> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會設定使用<xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=nameWithType>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleDate%2A> property is updated before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleDate%2A>之前更新屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: You can provide a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnVisibleMonthChanged%2A> event handler to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleDate%2A> property and override the automatically generated value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以提供自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnVisibleMonthChanged%2A>事件處理常式，以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleDate%2A>屬性，然後覆寫自動產生的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleDate%2A> property to programmatically set the value that determines the month that is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleDate%2A>屬性以程式設計方式設定的值會決定顯示在該月<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the next or previous month navigation controls on the title heading.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按一下標題上的往下或往上月份巡覽控制項時。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the user clicks the next or previous month navigation elements on the title heading.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下標題上的一個或下一個月份巡覽項目，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged> event to display whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control has moved forward or backward one month.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged>要顯示的事件是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項已移往前或往後的一個月。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the weekend dates on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 控制項中週末日期的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that contains the style properties for the weekend dates on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 上週末日期的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the weekend dates on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來指定週末日期的樣式，在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A> property is not set, the style specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A>中未設定屬性，指定樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>屬性使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關可以控制不同的樣式屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A> property to specify a blue background color and a yellow foreground color for weekend dates.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A>屬性來指定一個藍色背景及黃色的前景色彩的週末日期。
